## EU5 Valid Modifiers Reference
## Source: https://eu5.paradoxwikis.com/Modifier_types + Vanilla Game Files
## Last Updated: December 4, 2025

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT: Wiki is INCOMPLETE - Always verify against vanilla files!**
‚ö†Ô∏è Wiki only shows subset of modifiers (buildings, laws, policies)
‚ö†Ô∏è Missing from wiki: Character traits, AI behavior, unit stats, many country modifiers

üìÅ **Complete authoritative list:** 
   game/main_menu/common/modifier_type_definitions/00_modifier_types.txt (13,789 lines)

üìÑ **Companion files:**
   - SCRIPT_VALUES_RESEARCH.md - All script value constants
   - EU5_EFFECTS_REFERENCE.txt - All valid effects
   - EU5_TRIGGERS_REFERENCE.txt - All valid triggers

======================
‚úÖ VERIFIED MODIFIERS (Confirmed in Vanilla Game Files)
======================

TRADE MODIFIERS (All Verified ‚úÖ)
----------------------------------
trade_efficiency                           # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
global_merchant_capacity_modifier          # multiplicative, percent, good ‚úÖ
merchant_maintenance_cost                  # percent, bad, multiplicative ‚úÖ
local_merchant_power                       # good, additive ‚úÖ
local_trade_center_power                   # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
global_trade_power                         # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
local_trade_power                          # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
global_trade_center_power                  # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
merchant_power_from_maritime               # good, additive ‚úÖ
merchant_power_from_maritime_modifier      # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
merchant_power_from_building               # good, additive ‚úÖ
local_merchant_capacity                    # good, additive ‚úÖ
merchant_capacity_from_building            # good, additive ‚úÖ
global_merchant_power                      # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
trade_income                               # good, additive ‚úÖ
local_trade_protection_factor              # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
global_trade_protection_factor             # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ

PRODUCTION & EFFICIENCY MODIFIERS (All Verified ‚úÖ)
----------------------------------
local_production_efficiency                # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
global_production_efficiency               # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
tax_income_efficiency                      # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
blockade_efficiency                        # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
trade_efficiency                           # percent, good, additive ‚úÖ
levy_combat_efficiency_modifier            # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ
slave_raid_efficiency                      # percent, good, multiplicative ‚úÖ

NAVAL MODIFIERS (Wiki + Verified)
----------------------------------
global_navy_levy_size_modifier             # multiplicative, percent, good
local_sailors_modifier                     # multiplicative, percent, good
global_ship_build_speed                    # percent, good, multiplicative
global_sailors_modifier                    # multiplicative, percent, good
global_naval_forcelimit_modifier           # multiplicative, percent, good

======================
DIPLOMATIC MODIFIERS
======================
diplomatic_capacity                        # good, additive (flat bonus)
diplomatic_upkeep_modifier                 # multiplicative, percent, neutral
diplomatic_range                           # percent, good, additive
improve_relations_modifier                 # percent, good, multiplicative

======================
ECONOMIC MODIFIERS
======================
monthly_gold_income                        # good, additive (flat gold per month)
global_tax_income_modifier                 # multiplicative, percent, good
monthly_traditions                         # good, additive

======================
MILITARY MODIFIERS
======================
fort_limit                                 # good, additive
global_manpower_modifier                   # multiplicative, percent, good
global_garrison_size_modifier              # multiplicative, percent, good
global_regiment_recruit_speed              # percent, good, multiplicative
land_forcelimit_modifier                   # multiplicative, percent, good

======================
POPULATION MODIFIERS
======================
global_burghers_migration_allowed          # boolean, good
global_burghers_desired_pop                # good, additive
global_burghers_rural_desired_pop          # good, additive
tolerance_own                              # good, additive
tolerance_heretic                          # good, additive
tolerance_heathen                          # good, additive

======================
GOODS-SPECIFIC OUTPUT MODIFIERS
======================
global_salt_output_modifier                # multiplicative, percent, good
global_fish_output_modifier                # multiplicative, percent, good
global_amber_output_modifier               # multiplicative, percent, good
global_cloth_output_modifier               # multiplicative, percent, good
global_naval_supplies_output_modifier      # multiplicative, percent, good
global_wood_output_modifier                # multiplicative, percent, good
global_iron_output_modifier                # multiplicative, percent, good
global_grain_output_modifier               # multiplicative, percent, good

======================
GOODS-SPECIFIC TRADE RESTRICTIONS
======================
ban_exports_of_salt                        # boolean, good
ban_imports_of_salt                        # boolean, good
ban_exports_of_fish                        # boolean, good
ban_imports_of_fish                        # boolean, good
ban_exports_of_amber                       # boolean, good
ban_imports_of_amber                       # boolean, good
# (Similar pattern for other trade goods)

======================
LOCATION-SPECIFIC MODIFIERS
======================
local_tax_income_modifier                  # multiplicative, percent, good
local_manpower_modifier                    # multiplicative, percent, good
local_development_cost_modifier            # multiplicative, percent, bad
local_unrest                               # bad, additive
local_autonomy                             # percent, bad, additive

======================
STABILITY & GOVERNMENT
======================
global_unrest                              # bad, additive
stability_cost_modifier                    # multiplicative, percent, bad
reform_progress_modifier                   # multiplicative, percent, good

======================
BOOLEAN MODIFIERS (yes/no flags)
======================
global_burghers_migration_allowed          # yes/no
allow_mercenary_recruitment                # yes/no
blocked_from_change_to_kingdom_rank        # yes/no (prefix: block_from_)
blocked_from_change_to_empire_rank         # yes/no

======================
MODIFIER BEHAVIOR TYPES
======================
additive        # Flat value added (e.g., diplomatic_capacity = 2 means +2)
multiplicative  # Percentage modifier (usually has _modifier suffix)
boolean         # yes/no flags (usually allow_/blocked_from_ prefix)
scaled          # Game-calculated based on other values

======================
DISPLAY PROPERTIES
======================
percent = yes   # Multiply value by 100 for display (0.10 shows as 10%)
decimals = 0    # No decimal places
decimals = 1    # One decimal place
decimals = 2    # Two decimal places

color = good    # Green for positive, red for negative
color = bad     # Red for positive, green for negative
color = neutral # Black (no color coding)

======================
USAGE NOTES
======================
- Multiplicative modifiers typically end with _modifier
- Global modifiers affect the entire country
- Local modifiers affect specific locations/provinces
- Boolean modifiers use yes/no values
- Percent modifiers: 0.10 = 10%, 0.05 = 5%, etc.
- Trade goods output modifiers are multiplicative percentages
- Tolerance values are flat additive bonuses
- Diplomatic capacity is a flat additive value
